General.Name: Stic Investments Inc
General.Description: STIC Investments, Inc. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializes in series A, series B, buyouts, secondary direct investments, corporate restructurings, mid-cap, and growth capital. STIC seeks to invest in mid-market companies operating in technology-based manufacturing industries, such as automotive, shipbuilding, healthcare, medical devices, and TMT sectors. The firm considers investments in industrial & business services such as diversified industrial technology, chemicals, packaging and logistcis; ICT such as software (application and infrastructure), hardware, cyber-security and semiconductor; consumer & consumer technology such as e-commerce, technology-enabbled services and payment services; games and entertainment such as online and mobile game and integrated management companies; bio&healthcare such as life sciences, pharmaceutical, medical products manufacturing ect. STIC Investments, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Seoul, South Korea with additional offices in Asia.
General.Address: 10th Floor, MSA Building, Seoul, South Korea, 06194
